++ Oilgar

Oilgar wants to control all of UnumKosmos, letting nothing stand in his way. He will rise to power. He was the first betrayl and the creator of alliances. He founded diplomacy and created strategized warfare. His races are the human and bugbears, naturally power hungry beings. Societys include dictatorships and sprawls. Those who pledge themselves to Oilgar can not be trusted, as they may turn on their allies at any second. They are masters of diplomacy and manipulation. Lichs and necromancers are normally followers of Oilgar, as they dedicated all of their life to power.
